Articles.Content:
This is a beefed up, heavy-duty version of my previous shuttle SSTO with almost twice the fuel capacity and wings that generate roughly 60% more lift! Here, I use it to make orbit and rendezvous with a class B asteroid and, using it's spacious cargo bay, attach wings and parachutes to the asteroid before landing safely at the KSC runway!

Here is a photo of it in action:

![zdCpvnE.png](http://i.imgur.com/zdCpvnE.png)

Both the new version - the "Emperor" - and the old version - the "Monarch" - are shown in action in my short videos below! Enjoy! 

<iframe width="480" height="270" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/LJQhPPIVoSA?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>

<iframe width="480" height="270" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/zYeS418TL7k?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>

[CRAFT DOWNLOAD - "EMPEROR"](https://www.dropbox.com/s/rspvek593y3u58b/Cargo%20Shuttle%20SSTO%20-%20Emperor.craft?dl=0) 

[CRAFT DOWNLOAD - "MONARCH"](https://www.dropbox.com/s/c3wycwgimgqiab7/Cargo%20Shuttle%20SSTO%20-%20Monarch.craft?dl=0)

**Edited <time datetime="2015-04-27T16:18:48Z" title="04/27/2015 04:18  PM" data-short="9 yr">April 27, 2015</time> by hazard-ish**
nice videos! do it work on 1.0.2?
